column4: hello every body can any body on this network please help me .. i want to go ahead with an lan masenger so des any body have  an idea regarding is there any software that can be used as an lan masenger on ubuntu  that can support multiple platform please reply
any idea regarding lan messenger on ubuntu that supports numerous platform
are you talking about something like Bonjour ?
:: i don't have any idea  regarding bonjour .. i am looking for some alternative of out look messenger
oh, well then I would suggest Pidgin or Empathy
:: but how to use that on lan
so you want to chat with just people on your LAN?
:: ya
yes, Pidgin has a feature for this, in Accounts then setup Bonjour
did you install Pidgin?
:: ya
go into Accounts, then Manage Accounts
:: till now no error
then Add Account, under Protocol select Bonjour
:: i have created an a/c in bonjur
ahh ok, now just do the same for your other computer on the LAN
then you should be able to see one another and chat
:: one more thing i would like to ask you .. do i nead to specify the same port under advance tab
I think so, but I don't see anything to specify a port in my Pidgin account for Bonjour
you should be able to just leave it as default
